models.DashboardAgent: Compact agent summary for the status grid — name, role, model, and current status.
models.ActivityItem: A recent agent response shown in the activity feed with agent attribution and snippet.
models.CostSummary: Today's total API spend with a comparison delta to yesterday.
models.ScheduledJobPreview: An upcoming scheduled job showing name, assigned agent, and next run time.
models.PipelineStatus: Task counts grouped by kanban column for the pipeline widget.
models.QuickAction: A shortcut button for common operations available from the dashboard.

relationships: ActivityItem references a DashboardAgent by agentName
ScheduledJobPreview references a DashboardAgent by agentName
PipelineStatus is an aggregate of Task entities from the Tasks section

recentActivity.snippet: Completed daily ops report — 3 incidents resolved, 0 open alerts.
Published weekly newsletter draft to #content-review for approval.
Deployed hotfix for authentication timeout issue to staging environment.
Rotated API keys for production gateway. All services healthy.
Responded to 12 community questions in #support channel.
Escalated billing anomaly to ops team — usage spike detected on agent-004.
Finished competitive analysis report covering 4 new market entrants. Report is 2,400 words with executive summary and recommendations.

quickActions.label: Dispatch Task
quickActions.description: Assign a one-off task to an agent

quickActions.label: Create Job
quickActions.description: Schedule a recurring job for an agent
